description: Shizuki Hitomi is http://anidb.net/ch25644 [Madoka] and http://anidb.net/ch25315 [Sayaka]`s classmate and friend, quite popular with the boys. She seems to believe Sayaka and Madoka are in a relationship and often feels she is being left out. In episode seven, she tells Sayaka that she loves http://anidb.net/ch27647 [Kyousuke] and that she plans to confess to him if Sayaka does not.
name: Shizuki Hitomi
